prolog.author: Anna van Raaphorst
Richard Johnson
prolog.publisher: OASIS (Organization for the Advancement of Structured Information Standards)

keywords.indexterm: outputs supported by DITA Open Toolkit Word RTF (Rich Text Format)
targets supported by DITA Open Toolkit Word RTF (Rich Text Format)

section.p: RTF (Rich Text Format) is a proprietary document file format developed and owned by Microsoft for cross-platform document interchange. Most word processors are able to read and write RTF documents.
Word RTF is one of the DITA Open Toolkit target outputs.
